allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Drawing; $src = [System.Drawing.Image]::FromFile\(\(Resolve-Path ''assets/images/Icon 512x512.png''\)\); $sizes = @{mdpi=48; hdpi=72; xhdpi=96; xxhdpi=144; xxxhdpi=192}; foreach \($dpi in $sizes.Keys\) { $size = $sizes[$dpi]; $dest = New-Object System.Drawing.Bitmap\($size, $size\); $graphics = [System.Drawing.Graphics]::FromImage\($dest\); $graphics.InterpolationMode = [System.Drawing.Drawing2D.InterpolationMode]::HighQualityBicubic; $graphics.DrawImage\($src, 0, 0, $size, $size\); $dest.Save\(""android/app/src/main/res/mipmap-$dpi/ic_launcher.png""\); $graphics.Dispose\(\); $dest.Dispose\(\); }; $src.Dispose\(\); Write-Host ''Icons generated''")
